title: (x) 'LACMA' logo: partly rounded sans caps - custom by 2X4 w/ John Baldessari {Dav}
author: Ken W

comments.content:
'... new logo, designed by the award-winning design firm 2X4 in collaboration with artist John Baldessari.'

'... 2X4 was tasked with modifying the logo into a typeface ...'

A custom typeface, designed by 2x4, based on the logo type.
